column2: #try a linear model with simple effects
model1 <- glm(as_juvenile ~ disc_dad + disc_mum + familysize + job_dad + friends + withdrawn + attitude_dad + iq + popularity + attendance, data = delinquency_train, family = "binomial")

glm(formula = as_juvenile ~ disc_dad + disc_mum + familysize + 
    job_dad + friends + withdrawn + attitude_dad + iq + popularity + 
    attendance, family = "binomial", data = delinquency_train)
Null deviance: 150.65  on 157  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 127.02  on 147  degrees of freedom
